resources.string: Already have an account? Sign In Now
Don’t have an account? Sign Up Now
Your booking is successful, One day before the event we will notify you and for that keep checking your email.
Password and confirm password is not matched.
Please make sure your password match.
If you give up, you will receive the answer to this clue but 5 minutes will be added to your time

Careful! 
 Open both test tubes carefully. 
 Pour the antidote into the virus test tube. 
 Dont worry if something spills on you.
 The Virus is now deactivated and harmless.
 MISSION COMPLETED! 
 The world is safe again
Congratulations, you have saved the world from the next pandemic. YOU MAY OPEN ENVELOPE #4
Enter the Email Address to receive the reset passsword link.
Continue if you agree to our Terms & Conditions and the Privacy Policy

Click on the menu above. 
 * Click on Map to see locations.
 * Click on Inventory to see clues found 
 * Click on Final Puzzle to finish the challenge

Here you will accumulate the clues found. To solve the final puzzle, CHOOSE a person, an object and a place that according to the INVENTORY clues will reveal the whereabouts of the AZTEC TREASURE. If you do not answer well, you will be penalized with time.
Wrong images selected penalty Time Added 5 min.

Disclaimer\n\n
I, as a user of the Secret Mission Society application, hereby declare that: I am of legal age and I am legally capable of signing and assuming this disclaimer, as well as that of the minors under my charge. I understand and accept that the practice of tourism and recreation in the public areas of Mexico City imply a risk that cannot be completely eliminated even when there is prevention, care, caution, instruction or experience, which may lead to physical injury. mild, moderate and severe, or even death, therefore, it is a free and voluntary decision to practice it. I know the content of this form, as well as all the rules and provisions established in the internal regulations of the area where the tourist / recreational activity will take place; consequently, I agree to respect and comply with them when visiting the transit area where the game will take place. I understand that I must be aware of the environment since it is not a controlled space. The game / activity is carried out on public roads where there is traffic of cars and people who are unrelated to the activity that is carried out. I am aware of the risk involved in carrying out these activities within the metropolitan area and the risks inherent in this area, therefore, I promise to maintain responsible behavior that does not increase the risks to my integrity and those in my charge. In case of non-compliance with the normative parameters, as well as with the internal regulations of the area for visitors, which cause an incident against my integrity, the National Patrimony of the State and the assets and infrastructure of the area, I will assume the costs and administrative, operational and logistical expenses generated by said action. Finally, I allow the free use of my name and any personal data obtained during my journey within the tourism and recreational activity transit area, for statistical and tourist purposes. I understand that the terms of this form are binding and that I have signed this document of my own free will. I declare that all the detailed information is true and verified by the competent Authority, for which I promise to assume the administrative, civil and/or criminal responsibility that derives from it, even for damages to third parties. By clicking on the following button, before starting the activity, I accept what has been described here before.

Instructions: You must visit the 20 places marked on the “MAP”. Each point will reveal information necessary for you to solve the "FINAL PUZZLE"
Click on “MAP”. Visit all marked points. As you find clues, they will be saved in the “INVENTORY”.
Once you have visited all the locations and solved the puzzles, go to “FINAL PUZZLE”
Choose the correct OBJECT, PLACE and PERSON to solve the final puzzle.
Navigate in the menu by pressing the upper part of your screen (three dots on the upper right side of the screen)
Be careful! You are in an uncontrolled public place. Be careful when crossing the streets and always keep an eye on your surroundings.
Please check mailbox we have sent your new password
Wrong Answer 2 min Time Penalty Added
Wrong Answer 5 min Time Penalty Added

Note: You can only choose team difficulty level for once, once you pick the level your team will play game it the selected level
Its look like your are not on puzzle location.\n You need to be inside the 100 meter radius of target location to begin the game.
